name: CLM_ADDL_ITEMS
description: This table stores the additional item code and additional item types that are found at the header level of a claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLM_ADDL_ITEM_CODE
columns.description: Stores the code associated with the additional item type of a claim.

columns.name: CLM_ADDL_ITM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Additional Data Type category ID for the claim.
